snippet.title: Dropzone: Closed Beta Trailer
snippet.description:
Enter Dropzone, the next generation of RTS action where players compete in intensely contested, head-to-head battles of strategy and skill. Players face each other in explosive 15-minute battles, controlling a squad of three 'Rigs‘, highly-tuned and customized combat robots.

To score points, players harvest a powerful energy source called Cores and upload them at the map's central Uplink. But they must contend with the deadly Kavash, an alien race that seeks to protect the Cores from all invaders. Choose from a variety of Pilots, Rigs, and Gear to customize your squad with hundreds of gameplay combinations, and develop formidable strategies to put your skills to the test against players from all over the world.

◄ Join the Dropzone Community ►
Forums:  https://board.dropzone.gameforge.com 
Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/PlayDropzone 
Twitter:  https://www.twitter.com/PlayDropzone
Website: https://www.playdropzone.com
